video_prompt: The city below transitions from traditional architecture to sleek, modern forms, illuminated by a celestial display shifting from distant stars to a swirling nebula. Figures move through the streets and across bridges, as internal lights within buildings and suspended structures pulsate and shift in intensity.
image_prompt: A highly detailed, imaginative artwork: an enclosed East Asian-futuristic city under a cosmic sky. Traditional pagodas and illuminated structures are suspended within a metallic grid, above a circular, walled city with intricate East Asian architecture, waterways, and glowing modern buildings, all bathed in warm light against a vibrant nebula and starry backdrop.
refined_video_prompt: Architectural forms dynamically transform from traditional to modern. The celestial display above swiftly shifts from receding stars to an expanding, swirling nebula. Figures actively move across streets and bridges. Internal building lights and suspended structures intensely pulsate and shift in their luminescence.
